text: Curious about Patton Oswalt’s wife? We’ve got all the details on his relationship with Meredith Salenger. From their whirlwind romance to their shared love of film and comedy, their journey highlights the personal life of the acclaimed comedian and his talented partner. Let’s dive into who Patton Oswalt’s wife is, her career accomplishments, and the key moments that define their enduring relationship. Who is Patton Oswalt married to? Patton Oswalt is married to Meredith Salenger. The couple tied the knot on November 4, 2017, in a ceremony officiated by their mutual friend, actress Martha Plimpton. Their relationship began in early 2017 and quickly progressed to an engagement by July of the same year. Oswalt was previously married to writer Michelle McNamara, who passed away in 2016. He and McNamara had one daughter, Alice, whom Salenger has since embraced as her stepdaughter. Oswalt has openly expressed gratitude for finding love again after his late wife’s passing. What isMeredith Salenger’s job? Meredith Salenger is an actress and voice artist. She gained fame as a child actress in the 1985 adventure film The Journey of Natty Gann and later appeared in projects such as Dream a Little Dream, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, and Dawson’s Creek. In addition to her live-action roles, she has built a successful career in voice acting. She has contributed to animated series such as Star Wars: The Clone Wars, Star Wars: Tales of the Empire, and The Secret Life of Pets 2. Beyond entertainment, Salenger has a degree in psychology from Harvard University and has worked as a mediator specializing in family law. Patton Oswalt and Meredith Salenger’s relationship history Patton Oswalt and Meredith Salenger were introduced through mutual connections, particularly actress Martha Plimpton (via People). They began communicating online in early 2017 before meeting in person in May of that year. Their first public appearance as a couple was at the Baby Driver premiere in June 2017, followed by their engagement announcement in July. Their wedding took place in Los Angeles at Jim Henson Studios in November 2017. Salenger became a stepmother to Oswalt’s daughter, Alice, and has embraced the role wholeheartedly. The couple also co-hosted the podcast Did You Get My Text?, where they discussed their daily lives, pop culture, and humorous exchanges.
